wiiusej.wiiusejevents.physicalevents
Class ClassicControllerEvent

java.lang.Object
  wiiusej.wiiusejevents.GenericEvent
      wiiusej.wiiusejevents.physicalevents.ExpansionEvent
          wiiusej.wiiusejevents.physicalevents.ClassicControllerEvent

public class ClassicControllerEvent
extends ExpansionEvent

This class represents the values from the classic controller and its events.

Author:
guiguito

Constructor Detail

ClassicControllerEvent

public ClassicControllerEvent(int id,
                              short buttonsJustPressed,
                              short buttonsJustReleased,
                              short buttonsHeld,
                              float rightShoulder,
                              float leftShoulder,
                              float langle,
                              float lmagnitude,
                              short lmax1,
                              short lmax2,
                              short lmin1,
                              short lmin2,
                              short lcenter1,
                              short lcenter2,
                              float rangle,
                              float rmagnitude,
                              short rmax1,
                              short rmax2,
                              short rmin1,
                              short rmin2,
                              short rcenter1,
                              short rcenter2)
Constructor of ClassicControllerEvent.

Parameters:
id - id of the wiimote.
buttonsJustPressed - buttons just pressed.
buttonsJustReleased - buttons just released.
buttonsHeld - buttons just pressed.
rightShoulder - right shoulder button (range 0-1).
leftShoulder - left shoulder button (range 0-1).
langle - angle the left joystick is being held.
lmagnitude - magnitude of the left joystick (range 0-1).
lmax1 - maximum left joystick value 1.
lmax2 - maximum left joystick value 2.
lmin1 - minimum left joystick value 1.
lmin2 - minimum left joystick value 2.
lcenter1 - center left joystick value 1.
lcenter2 - center left joystick value 2.
rangle - angle the right joystick is being held.
rmagnitude - magnitude of the right joystick (range 0-1).
rmax1 - maximum right joystick value 1.
rmax2 - maximum right joystick value 2.
rmin1 - minimum right joystick value 1.
rmin2 - minimum right joystick value 2.
rcenter1 - center right joystick value 1.
rcenter2 - center right joystick value 2.
Method Detail

isThereClassicControllerLeftJoystickEvent

public boolean isThereClassicControllerLeftJoystickEvent()
Tell if there is a classic controller left joystick event.

Returns:
TRUE if there is a classic controller left joystick event, false otherwise.

public boolean isThereClassicControllerRightJoystickEvent()
Tell if there is a classic controller right joystick event.

Returns:
TRUE if there is a classic controller right joystick event, false otherwise.
